summary: This is my Skyrim conversion of my Oblivion mod by the same name
descriptionHtml:
Dreadweave Axes v1.0 by Nicoroshi
__________________________________

Reason for this mod:
_____________________

This axe model I created for Oblivion based on a fantasy axe that can be bought.

It was part of a complete set of Dreadweave equipment i created for my character in Oblivion.

I really like this model so I wanted it in Skyrim too.


What this mod does:
____________________

This mod adds 2 Dreadweave Axes to Tolvald's Gap. They are also craftable with the Ebony smithing perk, and can be improved at the grind stone.


Where are they?
________________

They are located in Tolvald's Gap on either side of the charrus pen gate.


How strong are they?
_____________________

Between Ebony and Daedric war axe. They are not enchanted.


How do I install this mod???
_____________________________

I have created the file paths for you to (hopefully) make it easy.

If you're reading this I can assume you've unpacked the 7zip archive.

Find the folder (that is right next to this Readthis file) called 'Data', and either copy it or drag, and drop it into your Skyrim folder (normally located at C:Steamsteamappscommon)

Answer "Yes to All" when prompted by windows.

Start Skyrim, and go to Data. Checkmark 'Dreadweave axes' and enjoy.


Version history:
_________________

1.0 initial release


Credits:
_________

The designer of the Alien Axe that my model's shape is based off of.


Permissions:
_____________

All resources from this mod WILL stay specific to this mod.

You may NOT re-upload this mod anywhere.

You may translate this mod into a different language but must send me the files to upload them at Skyrim Nexus only.


Note to my permissions:
________________________

Recently I became aware of my models being uploaded into Skyrim Nexus without my permission.

They were hacked into the game before a creation kit was released by Bethesda, and before I was given a chance to upload my own work.

This person changed the names of my mod, and many people believed the models were his work.

Because of this I will no longer grant any permissions to use my models or textures in anything other than a direct translation of my mod into a different language which must include the original readthis file in English.


Author's Note:
_______________

I plan on creating a combined .esp of all my released mods once the ones I want in Skyrim are released.

This like my other mods is dedicated to my wife, and her struggle against cancer.

I hope you enjoy it.
author: Nicoroshi
